algorithm_technique: Union-Find with bitmasking to represent character sets and group connected strings.
problem_summary_simple: Group strings based on character set similarity (add, delete, or replace one character). Find max groups and largest group size.
problem_summary_technical: Uses Union-Find to group strings based on bitmask representations of their character sets, considering single-character edits.
key_insights: Bitmasks are efficient for representing sets of lowercase English letters.
Union-Find is ideal for managing disjoint sets and merging connected components.
The connection logic (add/delete/replace one char) can be efficiently checked using bitwise operations on masks.
